reviews.text: This is a HIDDEN GEM!  If you like cheese steaks.... There is no other place to go in Columbus Ohio than to this year old restaurant located in the heart of...

This is a solid cheesesteak and the fries were awesome! And great prices too! 

I visited their location at Budd Dairy and am excited to go back to try some...
Get here a little before Happy hour because this place gets packed!  Great music, and not too loud.  Cute decor. We went on a Friday.  It wasn't a party...
